mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Dactylography", clipping; 02 of 03
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 74-75; "Dactylography"; Clipping, apparently written by Faulds, regarding his first letter to Nature magazine, fingerprints and patterns, Galton, and a discussion of Faulds's own methods of possible classification. Handwritten notes to omit a section, additions, etc. On page 75, clippings are on both front and back.; 3 leaves; DF 871
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
Fingerprints
